meanings.sent1: The takers of the cookies were happy.
meanings.sent2: The takers of the gifts were grateful.
meanings.sent3: The takers of the last slice of cake were in for a treat.
meanings.sent4: The takers of knowledge always have full minds.
meanings.sent5: The takers of the treasure found joy in their discovery.

meanings.definition: A participant in a transaction who accepts an offer.
meanings.sent1: The takers of the discount were pleased.
meanings.sent2: The takers of the deal were satisfied.
meanings.sent3: The takers of the free samples were in for a surprise.
meanings.sent4: The takers of the opportunity seized the moment.
meanings.sent5: The takers of the prize celebrated their win.

meanings.definition: A person who accepts or receives something offered.
meanings.sent1: The takers of the invitation RSVP'd promptly.
meanings.sent2: The takers of the award were honored.
meanings.sent3: The takers of the challenge were up for it.
meanings.sent4: The takers of the responsibility showed dedication.
meanings.sent5: The takers of the charity's help were grateful.
